params.fields: a.*, b.*, c.*, a.branch_id branch_id, c.branch_id branch_id3, b.validity validity2, c.validity validity3
params.table: campaign a, zone_campaign_mapping b, zone c
params.condition: a.id in (3202, 3203) and a.id = b.campaign_id(+) and b.zone_id = c.id(+) and a.validity = 1 and b.validity(+) = 1 and c.validity(+) = 1 AND TRUNC(a.start_date, 'dd') <= TRUNC(sysdate, 'dd') AND TRUNC(a.end_date, 'mi') >= TRUNC(sysdate, 'mi')
